title: Introduction to Python Programming
details: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming language, including variables, data types, control flow, and functions.

title: Web Development with JavaScript
details: Master JavaScript and its usage in web development. Covers DOM manipulation, AJAX, and modern frameworks like React and Angular.

title: Java Programming for Beginners
details: Start your journey into Java programming with this comprehensive course covering basic syntax, OOP concepts, and more.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms in C++
details: Explore advanced data structures and algorithms in C++, including arrays, linked lists, trees, sorting algorithms, and more.

title: Python for Data Science
details: Learn Python programming specifically for data science applications, covering libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib.

title: iOS App Development with Swift
details: Build iOS applications from scratch using Swift programming language. Covers UI design, networking, and data storage.

title: Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp
details: Comprehensive bootcamp covering both front-end and back-end web development technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and databases.

title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
details: Introduction to machine learning concepts and algorithms, including supervised and unsupervised learning, regression, classification, and clustering.

title: Android App Development with Kotlin
details: Learn to develop Android apps using Kotlin programming language. Covers UI development, intents, and working with databases.
